newsitem.title: USA: EIS International Inc faces new charges.
newsitem.headline: EIS International Inc faces new charges.

text.p: Two New York law firms on Tuesday said they filed a class action suit against EIS International alleging insider sales and misrepresentation of financial statements.
It is the third class-action suit filed against EIS since April 29.

The law firms Weiss & Yourman and Stull, Stull & Broody said they filed the suit on behalf of purchasers of the company's stock during the period running from April 24, 1996, through January 24, 1997.
The complaint charges EIS, which makes phone call processing systems, made millions of dollars in insider sales.

The suit also alleges EIS officials violated the Securities and Exchange Act of 1934 by making material misrepresentations and omissions concerning the company's financial statements, operations and products.
